page.title: 03HOUSING, BARMBY MOOR
page.content: HOUSING; BARMBY MOOR. pop.840. This is a village proper, the centre is as it has always been vis; a village green with beck, & the Church.Recent housing developments have been like another outer ring on a spider's web. There are 2 shops, a grocers & off-licence,and grocer with sub.-Post Office. The school is split in 2 sections.The oldest and original sec.,Juniors, and the additional sec.,Infants.The school has 3 full time and 1 part time teacher. The local Garage has a shop.Other businesses include;-Hairdresser,Cattery,Nursery-m an,and a Nurseryman/Landscape Gardener.The Blacksmith's is now an Agricultural Engineer, for B.Moor is surrounded by farms.A Wholesale Sweet Firm offers employment to a few.
